attributes.action: Stop David Camerons Resignation Honours List
attributes.background: We the people of Great Britain call upon the Government to stop David Camerons Resignation Honours List and also carry outca review and overhaul the current honours system to stop Cronyism

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours

We can, however, accept petitions about changing the overall honours system, and you may wish to sign a petition that makes a similar proposal to your request for the system to be overhauled:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/163670
